Text: I'd like to buy it, but never, ever want to have a PayPal account. I'd also be willing to pay more to cover the processing fees if I could use my credit card. Is there any chance you could make other options possible?

Yeh I have my issues with paypal as well- but I couldn't find any other payment processing options that work with the cart service I'm using that were any good- Should I take payment in Bitcoin? ^_^ Let me know what you think! Thanks!
